AlertTypes.name: Storage
AlertTypes.description: The threshold for storage usage. The system will send email notifications when the usage exceeds the threshold.

AlertTypes.name: Memory
AlertTypes.description: The threshold for memory usage. The system will send email notifications when the usage exceeds the threshold.

AlertTypes.name: CPU
AlertTypes.description: The threshold for CPU usage. The system will send email notifications when the usage exceeds the threshold.

AlertTypes.name: Machine quota
AlertTypes.description: The threshold for machine quota usage. The system will send email notifications when the usage exceeds the threshold.
